column1: Smoque BBQ////After some extensive research prior to our trip to Chicago from LA
column2: I found Smoque listed as one of the best bbq places in the area . And boyyyy were they right . This place was awesome
column3: my boyfriend and I really enjoyed our meals and we were stuffed after eating about half . The brisket is super tender and literally falls apart when you pick it up
column4: I even took a video to send to my bbq obsessed dad back home . The Memphis bbq sauce was my absolute favorite and I would buy it by the bottle if I could . Awesome food
